name: Ayyash Studio — The kick-start kit
author: ThemeRox

sections.description:
Ayyash Studio offers you 20+ premade, super-fast professionally developed and optimized templates for the Elementor Page builder. You just need to select the demo, choose the color and typography according to your requirements and import it to go live with the full template. Gutenberg support will be added soon.

The Ayyash Studio plugin enables you to import a full demo to create a professional website for your needs. The user interface of the plugin makes it easier for you to customize and import demos.

The color preset features will allow you to choose from different predefined color presets. You can also select different typography and logo to customize the demo and import it. The advanced search filters allow you to find the suitable templates you need.

Ayyash Studio offers full website templates for businesses like –

  • Agencies
  • Artists
  • Interior Design
  • Pet Care Service
  • Plumber
  • Repairing Service
  • Portfolio
  • Weeding
  • Podcast and others

Why you would love to use Ayyash Studio

Easy Customization – Ayyash Studio provides a lot of features and functionalities in a very
easy interface so that you can easily customize everything. You can upload your logo, and
select the colors and typography before importing the full website.

Better performance – Ayyash Studio maintains the best coding structure so that it can load
faster and provide the best performance you need.

Unique Design – You don’t need to think about your website design, Ayyash studio offers
pixel-perfect website design fully ready to import with a few clicks.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
Will “Ayyash Studio” work with any theme?

Currently, the Ayyash Studio plugin only works with the Ayyash theme for now. More theme will be available in the future.

Are all the templates free?

Currently, all the published templates are free, and we are working on some premium quality templates.

Can I import the demo to my existing website?

Yes, you can import the demo on your existing website. You can choose to import with/without demo content.

Does it overwrite existing content?

Yes and no. If you import more than once, you can choose to delete old imported (dummy) contents.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3 – 2022-08-21

  • Fixed: Menu responsive issue fixed.
  • Fixed: Site view page typography tooltip issue fixed.
  • Tested: Elementor 3.7
  • Tested: Woocommerce 6.8

1.0.2 – 2022-07-31

  • Added: Contact form 7 support added.
  • Updated: PHPCS re-validated and fixed “current_time( ‘timestamp’ )” warning.
  • Updated: Include new prebuild sites in cached json.

1.0.1 – 2022-07-26

  • Update: Reload categories & editors after synchronization.
  • Update: Improve color palette.
  • Fixed: Infinite reload for after install.
  • Fixed: Blank page after install with cached json data for freshly installed sites.
  • Added: Tested-upto & minimum required versions.

1.0.0 – 2022-07-24

  • Initial Release

short_description: Create pixel-perfect website within a few clicks with “Ayyash Studio”. Import pre-built sites, tweak palette, font-pair, contents.
